item.title: Presentation Media
item.author: yourname@example.com (Christian Mohn)
item.description: I’ve made a few photos available on my Presentation Media page. Feel free to use any and all of these images in your presentations, blog posts or wherever you may see fit. All images are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
